Title: Lake Orion.
Subtitle: .
Authors: James E. Ingram;Lori Grove.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=OioLW2Hq3sQC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: Orion Township, established in 1835, became a prosperous agrarian and resort community by the beginning of the 20th century. The village of Lake Orion developed as the center of commerce for township residents and a summer community of tourists and revivalists. Passenger boats and an amusement park popularized Lake Orion as a vacation destination with hotels and summer cottages. Suburban development has since transformed the landscape, but township signposts proudly display a vestige of the past: Orion Township, where living is a vacation.
